title: Prayer Tracker
allSynced: Cloud backup is up to date
restoreConfirm: This will merge cloud data with your phone records.
noBackupsFound: No backups found in the cloud.
subscribeInfo:
Cloud sync allows you to save your prayer records and retrieve them later.
This ensures your records are preserved in case of device change or reset.
userConsent:
We value your privacy — your email will never be shared with third parties.
By continuing, you agree to the storage of your email for backup purposes.
enterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
backupErrorMessage: Backup failed. Please make sure you are logged in or that your subscription is active.
checkEmailForLink: Please check your email for the login link.
whenDidYouMakeup: Which prayer did you make up?
perfectDayMsg: You performed all prayers on time today. May Allah accept it.
selectLocationInfo: Search for your district to see accurate prayer times on Home.
